Articles.Content:
Are you a new? Are you wise? Are you a Kerbal Spaceman? Do you Play KSP? Do you wish you could be awarded for playing the game on the fourms? This is like the Oscar-B Awards. I TOOK INSPIRATION

There are MANY catrgorys. Channel dpoes not Count but Twitch does.

There is 3 MAJOR medals. THen Top 10 TOp 20 down to Top 50. THere is also Nominee's medals. Say someone is nomiated and they dont get the medal They can still get one as a reward for being notcied. After All the nomiees are posted I will make a thred for Each Sub Category so you can vote. Voting will be discussed in thier own thred.

This thred will be for submissions of people.

This is how

I,(Your name), Nominate (their name) for (Subcategory/Category)

Where it says Overall Anyone who was nominate for example Nicest stream is in. It is for The most votes in that Area

If it is overall it is total in that sub category

Categorys:

TWITCH

Best Helpful Broadcast

Upcoming Star (People who are not as good as EJ or Das Below 100 viewers on average).

Nicest Stream Small (Under 50-75)( I have leeway)

Nicest Stream Medium(under 150)

Nicest stream Overall

I do want ideas and such as I may do a Pick's choice for each

C&C please
